message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $140.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm really interested in the product, but I'd like to see if we can meet in the middle.
I understand you're looking to meet in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $130. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. How about $142.50?
I understand your concerns about making a profit, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about $136.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet us halfway, but I'm not sure I can go that low. I'm willing to make another compromise. How about $139?
I'm getting close to accepting, but I'm still looking to shave off a few more dollars. How about $138?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $140. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider selling to someone else.
